scripts.buildDev: node-sass scss/master.sass public/css/master.css && browserify web/App.js -t [ babelify --presets [ latest react ] ] > public/js/app.js && browserify web/ContactApp.js -t [ babelify --presets [ latest react ] ] > public/js/contact.js
scripts.build: npm install && node-sass scss/master.sass public/css/master.css && browserify web/App.js -t [ babelify --presets [ latest react ] ] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > public/js/app.js && browserify web/ContactApp.js -t [ babelify --presets [ latest react ] ] -g [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] -g uglifyify | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > public/js/contact.js
scripts.forever: npm run build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --only bignote
scripts.reload: npm run build && pm2 reload bignote
